question:
A jar contains 7 red balls and 9 blue balls. We choose, uniformly at random and without replacement, 5 balls. Let $A$ be the event [defs] A = "exactly 2 of the balls are red or exactly 3 of the balls are blue". [/defs] What is $\Pr(A)$?
$\frac{{7 \choose 2}}{{16 \choose 5}}$ $\frac{2 \cdot {7 \choose 2}{9 \choose 3}}{{16 \choose 5}}$ $\frac{{7 \choose 2}{ 9 \choose 3}}{{16 \choose 5}}$ $\frac{{7 \choose 2} + {9 \choose 3}}{{16 \choose 5}}$
